name: caesar-scrolls-app
description: Caesar Token Ecosystem - Complete DeFi Platform

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix agora-dex" "npm run dev --prefix satchel-wallet" "npm run dev --prefix tablets-ui"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix agora-dex && npm run build --prefix satchel-wallet && npm run build --prefix tablets-ui
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd agora-dex && npm install && cd ../satchel-wallet && npm install && cd ../tablets-ui && npm install

author: Caesar Token Team
